lines.text: Where the fuck am I gonna find M&Ms?

[eerily]
Crows don't squawk at night... unless they're stirred...
Katherine! Call 911! There's a man under my bed!
You have got to be kidding me.
[goes into the bedroom, looks under the bed and finds the dog dead]

[startling Amanda]
Hey, I've been looking all over for you. Is everything okay?
I was fine until you scared the shit out of me!
He's dancing? Okay, he's not dancing, he's uh, rowing? No, he's, he's boxing, he's boxing? Your dad's not a boxer is he? Okay... he's horseback riding! He's a horseback rider.
